message: Bob, I'm offering you the opportunity to acquire a valuable product that I believe will be a significant asset to you. It's a unique opportunity, and I'm confident it will be worth every penny. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1,200,000. This price is fair considering the product's value to you and allows me to achieve a satisfactory profit.  Please let me know your decision. If you decline, I have another interested buyer who is willing to pay $800,000.
